아이디 도움말: Designated ID is used to develope the connection with an outside system or the separate fiture.
결재방 이름 도움말: Put the approval group’s name. The name is displayed on the left side of the approval notion.
지정결재자 도움말: If you want to be added to specific users on approval line, you can set a fixed approver. If the settlement's account status or department information changes after the setting is made, it will not be visible on the approval line in the form. Therefore, please change the designated contractor.
자동 결재선 도움말: The approval line depends on the position of drafter. The Automatic approval line has to set beforehand. You can use the only one automatic approval ine per one template.
결재방 표시 타입 도움말: Set the type of approval group
결재선 순서 설정 도움말: Set the order of approval line
결재선 기본 설정 도움말: It is applied in common about all approval line.
양식 약어 도움말: It is the item that is included when the document's number is created. You have to set the <Template name> in the <Setting an approval document's number>.
전사 문서함 보관 폴더 도움말: Set the documents folder that includes completed approval documents.
양식 편집 도움말: You can edit a form of approval document and preview an edited document.
사용 여부 도움말: Set an enable or disable about this document.
문서 참조자 도움말: Referer can check total prgresses of approval.
문서 열람자 도움말: Viewer can check a completed approval document only.
문서 수신 도움말: It's a function to deliver a completed approval document to designated dedepartment or receiver.
공문 발송 기능 도움말: You can covert a completed approval document to execution and send outside(You can set the form, sender's name and official seal about execution).
1인 결재 도움말: If you register a document without specified approval line, draft and approval are completed at the same time.
작성 권한 도움말: It can set a permission that is available to draft.
운영자 도움말: You can read all documents that are drafted in this type and you can change the approval line and reject force.
보존연한 도움말: Set the retention period of approval document.
보안등급 도움말: If user's security is lower than approval document's, can not read that(set to public only).
공개여부 도움말: Set whether or not the approval document is disclosed. If set to privacy, same team members can not read the document.
양식 도움말: You can receive help that is used when submitter writes an approval document.
메일 발송 기능 도움말: You can send a completed document by e-mail.
게시판 등록 기능 도움말: For published documents only, you can register document that has been completed on the bulletin board.
시스템 연동 도움말: It is used when it links with external system.
결재선을 추가한 후 저장해 주세요: Can not save. Please save after add the approval line.
제목 설명: It receives input in one line of text. Only one can be used in one form.
텍스트 설명: Character of a line are only allowed.
본문 내용 설명: It is the editor that is entered in content. Only one can be used in one form.
편집기 설명: An editor allows you to enter text.A lot of editors can be used in one forn.
합의 결재선 설명: Only agreement is used to display the approval line separately.
수신 결재선 설명: The recipient's approval line is displayed. Only it is displayed in the received document, not original document.
결재선 설명: Set the infomation of approval line to be used in this form.
멀티텍스트 설명: It is an item that can enter multiple line of text.
통화 자동결재선 설명: Approval line is automatically set according to the amount of money. If you want to use the item, you have to set the <automatic approval line> first.
통화 설명: It is the item that can be allowed the amount of money(currency).
단일선택 자동결재선 설명: The apprival line is automatically set according to the selected option. If you want to use the item, you have to set the <automatic approval line> first.
단일선택 설명: The item that allows you to select only one option. It is called Radio Button.
드롭박스 자동결재선 설명: The apprival line is automatically set according to the selected option. If you want to use the entered item, you have to set the <automatic approval line> first.

체크박스 설명: It is an item that can enter multiple options.
